Description: Sets up a WebServer instance on AML2 in US-West 1, opens ingress security groups as well as configuring the webserver

Fn::Join:
#!/bin/bash -xe exec > >(tee /var/log/user-data.log|logger -t user-data -s 2>/dev/console) 2>&1 sudo yum update -y sudo yum install -y httpd sudo yum install -y mod_ssl sudo yum install -y yum-cron sudo cd /etc/pki/tls/certs && sudo ./make-dummy-cert localhost.crt sudo systemctl start httpd sudo systemctl enable httpd sudo systemctl enable yum-cron.service sudo systemctl start yum-cron.service sudo echo "

Hello AWS!

" > /var/www/html/index.html sudo echo "Github source" >> /var/www/html/index.html
